name: Ghosts and Goblins 2
description:
Hi all.
I am creating this remake to commemorate its 35th anniversary.
I have already created 6 of the 13 levels that I plan to do.
The game is in development. I hope your comments and that you enjoy it as I do.
NEW FEATURES:
* Levels at various heights.
* There are 2 tours. The levels will light up as you get past the previous one and have collected the keys: Green level = clear, orange level = unlocked, red level = locked.
* Discover the route to reach the final boss.
* Find the keys to pass the level.
* New dangers and enemies.
* There are several points to recover the armor  in each level. Find them!
* There is a hidden yashichi  in each level.
* Teleporter doors.
* Now bags and coins do matter.
MOVEMENT
* Customizable keyboard or gamepad.
* During the game: 'P' exit to the menu. 'ESC' to exit the game.
The video is a bit outdated. I'll upload an updated one soon.
Thank you very much and take good care of yourselves.
